owner.name: Owner
owner.description: Owner of the widget template to customize internal widgets

observer.name: Observer
observer.description: Can see the widget template; may not be able to see all contained widgets to other permissions

adding-no-widgets.title: No widgets supported
adding-no-widgets.intro: The document you dropped, <Document/>, does not support widgets at this time. Try another document type.

delete-widget-modal.title: Remove Widget
delete-widget-modal.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to delete the {{widgetType}} widget? This action cannot be undone.
